DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to perform a randomized, controlled clinical trial to investigate if the phosphate binder sevelamer can improve insulin resistance and glucose handling in patients receiving maintenance hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Sevelamer on Glucose Tolerance and Insulin Sensitivity in Patients With Chronic Renal Failure (CKD)
DOC.criteria: Male or female patients 1880 years of age with chronic renal failure treated with maintenance HD for >3 months. Diabetes mellitus Treatment with sevelamer within 3 months prior to enrollment Acute, clinically significant inflammation within 1 month prior to enrollment Pregnancy or breastfeeding Clinically significant obstipation or bowel obstruction Discontinuation of previous sevelamer treatment because of side effects Expected time in HD < 1 year Unwillingness to undergo the investigations and followup required in the the protocol Patients who have received any investigational drug within 1 month prior to enrolment Participation in another study, which may interfere with the present study
